name: recordDistribution
title: Record Distribution
subTitle: Ability to visualize items/records and their correlations in different levels based on a given grouping context.

metadata.description:
This widget has the following notable configurations available:
- Ability to group records by a field in the record, say “Levels” in Assets, which will be a Picklist.
- Ability to apply a filter on data source to allow limiting of input records.
- Ability to select which grouping values in the picklist to show in the view.
- Ability to show/hide record correlations.
- Ability to view all the records in the list grid, in scenarios where there are more records that can fit in the view.
- Ability to assign different icons to different types of records.
- Ability to click-through a record node to its respective detail view.
- Views adaptive in both light and dark themes.
- Ability to add this on a dashboard/report or a within an incident detail view.
